RESOLVED_ENTITIES.The United States Court of Appeals for t: The United States Court of Appeals for the Fifth Circuit

AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.The United States Court of Appeals for t: court that established the principle for applying sentencing guidelines
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Nancy F. Atlas: judge who must apply the correct version of the sentencing guidelines
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Jose Marlon Ibarra-Zelaya: defendant whose punishment is being determined
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States Sentencing Guidelines Manu: manual used to determine sentences, with versions applicable at different times
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.ex post facto Law: law that prohibits applying a more onerous penalty than was in effect at the time of the offense
